entry.title: Two killed and three injured in shooting near Brussels-Midi station
entry.content:

entry.title: Over 600,000 Belgian cars to be banned from Brussels after tightening of LEZ

entry.content:
'Only going to get worse': Rubbish situation in Brussels Brabant quarter adds to locals' concerns

A series of attacks on street cleaners has seen them halt activity, leaving rubbish piling up and fuelling concerns about insecurity in one of the city's most precarious neighbourhoods.

entry.title: Brussels police confirm 19 arrests after break up of Marseille-linked drug mafia
entry.content:

entry.content:
